@id.description: The identifier for the Chronometric Age object.

@type.description: The type of the digital object, in this case ods:ChronometricAge

chrono:chronometricAgeID.description: An identifier for the set of information associated with a ChronometricAge

chrono:verbatimChronometricAge.description: The verbatim age for a specimen, whether reported by a dating assay, associated references, or legacy information

chrono:uncalibratedChronometricAge.description: The output of a dating assay before it is calibrated into an age using a specific conversion protocol.

chrono:chronometricAgeConversionProtocol.description: The method used for converting the uncalibratedChronometricAge into a chronometric age in years, as captured in the earliestChronometricAge, earliestChronometricAgeReferenceSystem, latestChronometricAge, and latestChronometricAgeReferenceSystem fields.
examples: sequential 6 phase Bayesian model and IntCal13 calibration

chrono:earliestChronometricAge.description: The maximum/earliest/oldest possible age of a specimen as determined by a dating method

chrono:earliestChronometricAgeReferenceS.description: The reference system associated with the earliestChronometricAge

chrono:latestChronometricAge.description: The minimum/latest/youngest possible age of a specimen as determined by a dating method

chrono:latestChronometricAgeReferenceSys.description: The reference system associated with the latestChronometricAge

chrono:chronometricAgeUncertaintyInYears.description: The temporal uncertainty of the earliestChronometricAge and latestChronometicAge in years

chrono:chronometricAgeUncertaintyMethod.description: The method used to generate the value of chronometricAgeUncertaintyInYears

chrono:materialDated.description: A description of the material on which the chronometricAgeProtocol was actually performed, if known.

chrono:materialDatedID.description: An identifier for the MaterialSample on which the chronometricAgeProtocol was performed, if applicable

chrono:materialDatedRelationship.description: The relationship of the materialDated to the subject of the ChronometricAge record, from which the ChronometricAge of the subject is inferred

chrono:chronometricAgeDeterminedDate.description: The date on which the ChronometricAge was determined

chrono:chronometricAgeReferences.description: A list (concatenated and separated) of identifiers (publication, bibliographic reference, global unique identifier, URI) of literature associated with the ChronometricAge.

chrono:chronometricAgeRemarks.description: Notes or comments about the ChronometricAge

ods:hasAgents.description: The agent(s) involved in the determination of the chronometric age, uses `ods:Agent`
